column5: BEAUTY DAY OUT SO I THOUGHT ID TRY THAT 1% MARGINE AGAIN  LOL WATERS REALLY STARTIN TO DROP AND CLEAR RIGHT UP. HIT 2 TRIBS AND WALKED TOP TO BOTTOM(CN TRACKS DOWN) AND ONLY FOUND 1 BEAUTY CHUNK OF STEEL. TO MY SURPRISE I NEVER EVEN SAW A SUCKER SWIMMING ANYWHERE!!! LOOKS LIKE I CAN PUT SOME MORE TIME BACK INTO THE GYM TILL WE GET SOME RAIN!!! WELL THERES ALWAYS THE BOAT IF THE WINDS CALM DOWN  LOL
LOL! thats the last of em !  I hear u can fish the beaches and piers for Brown...
Same thing around here....levels dropped and cleared in no time.  Atleast in the bigger rivers we can still hit some drop backs in those nice deep holes while the put the feedbag on!
One?? LOL.  Guess that answers if I'm going to bother going out tonight....haha.  Good stuff CC....always a pleasure to see chrome in your report.
Atleast you got some well needed exercise.
im waiting till opener so i can quench my thirst for large resident brownies  like this wicked one i nailed last year in the ganny

You guys have to broaden out your fishing. Lake Simcoe is just starting to heat up for perch and crappie andthe Kawarthas will follow after the 26th of April. YOU CAN EVEN USE YOUR LONG RODS AND FLOATS. For those who have kids get them out and let them enjoy this fine fishing. I have a 13 year old daughter and a wife who enjoy this type of fishing and they each use a fairly long rod.
after the 26th i will be straight trouting brookies, browns and rainbows OH MY
WOW.....that thing is ancient, and I am not talking about the fish !!! Hey whatever works for ya...
